title: Wishbone and the amazing odyssey
description:
Wishbone and the amazing odyssey

Install:

1. Download Microsoft virtual pc 2007 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3747936/Microsoft_Virtual_PC_2007" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3747936/Microsoft_Virtual_PC_2007</a>

2.Install Windows 98
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3845084/Windows_98_Second_Edition_Full_Bootable_CD.iso

Windows 98 OEM Version Serial Number: VMGGK-72FPD-2PHRP-3HV4R-FYJQJ

3.Mount wishbone ISO.

4.Install quicktime.

5.Have fun.

*I realized that even the windows 3.1 version did not work properly. This is the only way to play it correctly.
